inn1.comm: right on target; in the zone outside off stump and moves away, Tamim shoulders arms

Fab shot to get off the mark. It was a on a length, a tad fuller perhaps, and outside off stump, Tamim leaned across and just knifed on the up and through extra cover. That's the way he plays his game.
hits the deck on the leg stump line, and it straightens to thud in to the thigh pad
Tamim is stronger on the off as compared to leg and again Nel cramps him with a delivery on the pads and it strikes the thigh pad again. Nel gives one long stare at the batsman
again on the hips and Tamim is a touch unsure but manages to push it away in front of square leg
lands on the middle and leg, moves towards middle and is turned to the on side.
around the off stump and Tamim tries to drive on the up but gets a inside edge on to the pad
short of length and moving away from Tamim who has a flash but makes no contact. He wanted to cut it over backward point but ...
length delivery, around the off stump and Tamim inside-edges another intended on-the-up drive
streaky boundary to the fine-leg region. A length delivery that came in and Tamim gets another inside-edge as he tries to drive through extra cover. Lucky escape, the ball rushed past the leg stump
Width outside off and Tamim slays it through extra cover. In style.
leans across, pushes a length delivery close on the off side and runs with the stroke to retain the strike
Nel keeps it o n the leg stump line and concedes a leg bye. Tamim, who is powerful on the off side, is not too comfortable with the leg and middle line.
full and outside off stump, leans forward to push it to mid-off

loud shout for lbw. Nel can't believe its not been given. Close call. Enamel Haque, the umpire who was a former cricketer himself, was not convinced. Full in length, on the middle and moving towards middle and off, he was on the front foot and was struck in line. Close.
in the zone outside off stump and is left alone
pushed outside off stump and no stroke offered.
on a length, on the stumps, worked to the on side
short of length, moves from leg and middle towards the off stump and defended down the track. Siddique is yet to get off the mark
Langeveldt catches and appeal for a bat pad catch but it was just pad. Full and swinging in late but he was struck outside the off stump and there was no bat on it.
pushed across Siddique and the keeper de Villiers gathers.

the inswinger (to the left-hander) is troubling the batsman. Fullish, and he shut the face of the bat early and got a leading edge, in the air, but luckily, for him it went over the short cover fielder and landed safely. He is off the mark. Finally.
Full and outside off, swing and a miss
another airy stroke, past the square leg fielder. Another one that straightened and Siddique again presses the front leg way too across and has to get his bat around it.
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to covers
on a length, around the off stump line, angling across and is turned to the on side
banged in short and ducked under
lovely shot. It was a short-of-length delivery, just outside off stump, he stood tall and punched through cover point. Duminy makes a fine sliding stop near the ropes. Great effort.
slanted across the batsman who shoulders arms
full and on the middle and leg line, turned through wide midwicket for couple of runs
mishit over mid-off. Full in length, outside off stump, Tamim tries to heave it over the infield but didn't connect properly
fullish and carved to covers
a tad short of length, angled across and is guided to third man
beaten. Siddique lunges at a length delivery and chases it as it moves away from him
full in length, down the leg side, tries to whip it away, misses and it brushes the pad en route to de Villiers, who is keeping today.
goes for a yorker, serves a low full toss and the batsman makes contact with the bottom half of the bat and the ball rolls over to mid-off
and again but this time driven to left of mid-off

on the leg and middle, tries to whip it to midwicket but the ball rolls towards square leg. As the tv replays show, he invariably gets his bat down from the leg stump. Ie He picks up the bat and it comes down in an angle from the leg stump towards the off. So he is good on the off but to play on the leg side, he has to then turn that bat angle and hence is ineffective.
bangs in short and turned past short fine leg but Langeveldt gets a hand on it and prevents a boundary
sharp bouncer and he sways away from the line
short of length, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
short of length, slanted across and punched to backward point
fuller and defended to covers
First wicket is down. Siddique is back in the hut. Banged in short and he top-edged a pull to Harris, who ran forward from mid-on to take a comfortable catch.
full and in the zone outside off stump, left alone.
and again.
pitched on middle, defended to off side
ooh inside edge, misses the stumps though. Nafees tries a cross-bat shot and the ball lands behind the wicket on the leg side
pitched on middle, driven towards mid-off
full toss, driven straight back to the bowler. Nel sledges Nafees who simply smiles
turned to short fine-leg
played and missed. This time Nel got it to pitch on off and move away.
pitched on off, driven to mid-off
yorker on middle and leg, turned away to behind square leg
punched to cover
slower ball, Tamim gets forward and plays a wild swing and misses
pitched on off, defended to short mid-off
wide outside off, ball keeps low, Nafees moves across slightly and slices it to point boundary
tries to cut but misses as ball is closer to off stump
pitched on middle and off, Nafees smothers it on the leg side
pitched outside leg, short ball, Nafees pulls but doesn't get the middle of the bat to it. It still travels to the midwicket boundary where Langeveldt stops from crossing over
loud appeal for lbw. but it is pitched outside leg stump
pushed to the covers
pitched on leg, Tamim drops the ball close to the pitch on the off side and takes off for a quick run
pitched on off and moving away. Nafees cuts it to third man
wide and short of length, Tamim cuts its hard to third man boundary
turned to short fine-leg
pitched on off, tries to drive but mistimes and the ball is flicked to mid-on instead
full in length, on the off and middle, jabbed away to the backward point
on the off stump line and is pushed towards mid-off
slow off cutter, turning in from outside leg and he misses to connect with a swing and is struck on the pad
he fetches this from the off stump line and swings it through wide mid-on
slower one, full and on the middle and leg, tapped gently to the leg side for a single
full toss above waist-high and its a no ball. It slipped out of the hand at the release
off cutter from the leg and middle line, guided to point
beaten outside off stump. Off cutter, moving past the batsman who tries to guide it to third man
fuller, wider and is sliced to cover point . The pitch has already got slower and they are slipping in a few slow off cutters.
from round the stumps this time and Nafees leans forward to defend compactly

100th ODI wicket for Nel. Fullish, outside off stump, moving away and Nafees goes back and across and tries to cut - not the length for it - and edges it behind. Nel is ecstatic and his team-mates rush to congratulate him.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to cover point

run out chance missed by de Villiers. He dropped the ball and broke the stumps with hands. It was turned to the vacant midwicket region and they came back for two. The throw came in low and the ball slipped out as he tried to collect and break the stumps in one motion.
on the middle and leg, tapped towards midwicket and the square-leg fielder gets across to make the stop
yorker outside off stump and Ashraful digs it out
outside off and Ash lets de Villiers gather it
on the middle, coming in a touch, worked to the on side.
another yorker outside off, steered to backward point. Powerplay 2 is over.
outside off stump and guided straight to backward point.
from round the stumps and again the same result. Pushed straight to backward point. Bangladesh are on 56 for 2.
banged in short, he hops to push it to covers. It's a no ball, though and a free hit is coming up.
swung over midwicket! It was a short-of-length delivery and he heaved it across the line and over the in field
coming in towards the pad, clipped to square leg
hits the deck short of length, outside off stump, jumps to get on top of the bounce and guides to backward point
on a length, on the middle, coming in from round the stumps, worked to the point region. Drinks on the field.
starts off with a yorker and stabbed to the on side
length delivery coming in towards middle, defended to the off side
fuller, on the off and middle again, Ash is a touch late in getting forward, just about leans forward to dead-bat it away
full pitched and driven elegantly to mid-off
leans forward, bat and pad together and defends.
full in length, on the middle, turned to short midwicket. Ash has been caution personified today.
lands outside leg, turns in and is defended on the front foot
turns towards middle and off, worked to the on side
fuller, on the legs, Nafees loses balance as he tries to whip it away and runs off the pad
a touch slower, on the middle and leg, mistimed back to the bowler
backs away a touch to create room and cuts past backward point.
fuller, straighter, driven to long-on for a single
short in length, on the hips, misses to connect a glance and picks up a leg bye
length delivery shaping in and clips the pad and rolls over the on side
full and straight, defended down the track
off the mark finally on the 15th ball he faced. It was full and around off stump, Ash shaped to defend and got a outside edge to third man
slow off cutter, guided to backward point region
goes back to defend to the off side
turns in from outside off, defended to the off side
flighted on the off and middle, turned to midwicket
and again. Ash has been pretty circumspect today.
leans forward and taps it down to long-on
tossed full, on the middle, mistimes a drive back to the bowler

charges out and tries to heave it inside-out over extra cover but gets an outside edge down to third man boundary. He raises his bat as the scorecard in the ground says he has reached 50 but according to the tv and Cricinfo scorecard he is on 49
fullish, on the middle and off, pushed to mid-off
on a length, around off stump, steered to left of sweeper cover
Ash breaks free with a lofted drive down the ground. It was a length delivery that came in towards middle, Ashraful plants his front foot out and knives between the bowler and mid-on
slower one, tapped to the off side

trapped by a yorker. Full and on the middle and leg stump line, swung in late  to evade the drive. Ash reckons it would have missed the leg stump but Umpire Enamul believes it would have crashed into the leg stump as the batsman had not taken a great forward stride.
full pitched, driven to sweeper cover
leans forward to drive to cover point
on the middle and leg, paddled away to fine leg
leans forward to defend
coming in with the arm, from round the stumps, defended back to the bowler
50 up now. He leans forward to ping long-off and raises his bat to acknowledge the cheers from the crowd and the dressing room.
turns in from outside off and evades the defensive prod and strikes the thigh pad
this one goes on straight, outside off and is beaten on the cut.
again beaten on the cut.
slightly short, punched to long on
flighted outside off, tries to sweep, misses, and it runs off the pad to short third man region
sharp turn there. It was a touch short and he shaped to cut but it spun in big to rap him on the pad. Interesting. Hmm..
leans forward to defend
flatter, quicker and is pushed down to long off for a single
floated on the off stump, pushed to covers
turned to midwicket region
short and goes back to turn it to vacant midwicket region

caught at midwicket. The pitch is getting increasingly slower and stroke play is getting difficult. He came down the track, trying to drive to long-on but couldn't reach the pitch of the delivery that stopped on him a touch and sent it straight to the fielder.
on the middle, defended on the back foot
floated on the off, goes back to tuck it right of point
lands on the off stump line, turns, nudged to the off side
leans forward to tap it to square leg
leans forward to defend.
leans forward to drive
outside off stump, tapped to point
full and driven to deep cover for a single
floated on the middle, turned to midwicket
comes in with the arm and strikes him on the pad.
outside off stump, goes on straight this time and he is beaten on the cut. Playing for spin but there is none.
goes back to punch it to long-on for a single
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
full and on the off stump, driven to long off
turns in from outside off, punched to man in the ring on the leg side.
leans forward to drive to long-on
leans forward to drive a full delivery to long off
slower in the air, outside off stump, tapped to short third man
fullish, driven to long-off for a single
fullish, driven to long-off for a single
Tamim continues to flourish. This one is a touch short and he punches it through cover point
floated outside off, charges out and drives to long-off
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
arm ball, on the middle, jabbed to the off side
leans forward to steer to backward point
leans forward to drive to long-on. Tamim is playing an excellent innings here. He has sized up the situation and is playing a patient and a responsible hand.
goes back to tuck it to square leg
turns from the leg stump line, pushed back to the bowler
a touch short but its pushed straight to midwicket
flighted delivery on the leg and middle, driven to long on for a single
dipping full toss, driven to long-on for yet another single
beaten by the turn. From round the stumps, it landed on middle and off and spun past the outside edge
on the similar line but not much turn this time and is guided past point
fullish and driven to short extra cover
tossed up full and is driven back to the bowler
quicker, on the middle and jabbed away to the off side
gets a inside edge on the drive but will pick up a single as it goes through midwicket
leans across to defend
beaten outside off stump. He expected it to turn in but it didn't.
leans across to get in line and pushes it to covers
goes back to punch it to midwicket
and again hit to midwicket

beaten. Flighted delivery outside off, dipped rapidly to evade the intended drive and de Villiers fails to gather it cleanly. Had he done so, Tamim would have been stumped. Strangely, Tamim took a long time to get back in; he had his foot on the line.
hmm... lost patience and has a wild swing. He tried to heave it over midwicket and got a leading edge over covers
he leans forward to drive to covers. No ball, though. Free hit coming up.
full and on the middle, slog swept to deep midwicket. He didn't get hold of that at all.
turned behind square leg for a single
from round the stumps, drifts in from outside off to the leg stump and is flicked away
floats across a off break, driven to long on
another one drifted from outside off towards the leg stump, its a full toss but the batsman couldn't put it away
he takes full toll this time. Full, on the middle and off, Tamim thrashes it inside-out to deep extra cover boundary
That's a biggie. Over the deep midwicket boundary. First six of the game. Tamim went down on his knee to slog-sweep it high and over the ropes.
leans forward to drive to long-off and will retain the strike
turns in from outside off, inside edges it to square leg
leans across to defend covers
floated on the off stump, driven to long-off

Tamim holes out to long-on. Valiant knock comes to an end. He charged out to Harris and heaved straight to the fielder. Out for 82. Well played but perhaps, he could have carried on. Wrong time to get out.
leans forward to defend a delivery on the middle and off
just outside off, pushed to covers
full pitched and driven to mid-off
full and straight, driven back to the bowler
fuller, driven to left of mid-on for a single
slips down the leg side. Wide.
full in length, just outside off stump, holds its line and Dhiman jabs it to the off side
full in length, on the off and middle and is pushed down the track
full and straight, edges a drive on to the pad and the ball rolls away to square leg
on the off stump line, driven to long-off for a single
armer, from outside off, defended to the leg side
slower in the air and Dhiman is early into his drive and gets a outside edge past the silly point fielder
leans forward to offer the full face of the bat in defense
on the middle and leg, tucked past square leg for a single and first runs for Dhiman
retains the strike with a drive past the diving Harris
lovely slow off cutter and he was beaten. Tried to check his shot and got an inside edge to square leg
off cutter on the off stump line, defended to the off side
on the hips, tucked past square leg
what a soft dismissal. Driven straight to mid-off. Full in length, outside off stump, he stretched forward and drove straight to the fielder.
in the zone outside off, left alone
runs a length delivery down to third man
beaten outside off. From round the stumps, full and in the corridor outside off, a lame poke
further outside off and is easily left alone this time
beaten again. Closer to the off stump and holding its line, he pushes inside the line
another probing delivery outside off and he withdraws his bat from the line. Nel is getting the ball to hold its line from round the stumps.
edged past the slip, down to third man. He just stood there and had a waft at a length delivery outside off.
swung in late and Dhiman, who stands with his bat slightly raised, did well to cover the line and defend.
flash and a miss. Full and slanting away and another lazy flash. No foot movement.
landed outside leg, comes in and runs off the pad past square leg. Morkel appeals but it pitched outside leg.
takes his front foot from the line and swings it to left of deep midwicket
slips on to the pads, clipped to fine leg for a single
slower one, full and on the leg and middle, tickled past square leg
straight, full and nudged back down the track
beaten on the drive. Again pretty late on the shot.
again beaten. This one lands on a length, outside off and straightens.. Again pretty leaden footed and he has a lame poke
he has had enough getting beaten repeatedly and tries to have a swing this time. He walked across and mistimed it past square leg
bangs in a bouncer, ducks under
on a length, cutting in towards the pad, worked to midwicket
another bouncer and again Dhiman goes down under
slower one, full and pushed gently towards mid-on for a single
on a length, on the middle and leg, scooped to midwicket
takes a step and tries to square drive but is beaten. He seems to be perennially late on that shot.
again de Villiers comes into picture as the ball rushes across the bat
just outside off, turns slightly, tapped to backward point
drives to sweeper cover
turns in from outside off, tickled to short fine leg
he shuffles across to the off stump, gets a inside edge on a pull shot
slower in the air, misses a sweep shot but will pick a leg bye
sweeps from outside off, gets a bottom edge to short fine leg
outside off, placed to left of backward point
rushes down the track, the bowler drags back the length and mistimes a heave to deep square leg
at the blockhole, dug out
trapped in front. Quicker one from round the stumps and he was caught dead plumb in front. The bat was held behind the pad and Hossain's misery ends.
another quicker one, but slipping down leg and is turned past square leg for a single
nice delivery. It landed outside off and if anything went the other way. The batsman was caught completely by surprise and just watched it spin into de Villiers' gloves
turns in sharply from well outside off, stabbed to the on side
on the off stump line, swept to long leg for a single
slower but on the pads, clipped for a single
dropped by Harris. It was hit hard at him and just went through his palms.
deploys the sweep shot and gets a single down to deep midwicket
floated on the leg and middle, chipped inside-out towards long-on for a single
full, outside off, tries to loft it but can only send it along the ground back to the bowler
Maximum. He went down on his knee, got under the ball and swung it cleanly over long-on
turns a full delivery past square leg, runs hard and comes back for the second run
goes for another lofted strike but mistimes it past midwicket
fuller, guided to cover point for a single
fullish, on middle and leg, helped to fine leg for a single
on a length, driven to covers
banged in short, ducked under, de Villiers gathers it but the batsmen rush across for a quick single before he could throw it back!
slower one, swing and a miss

low full toss, swiped low to covers where Smith takes it. The batsman thinks it might have bounced, the two umpires confer and he is given out. They don't refer it to third umpire. Smith claimed the catch. Replays don't confirm or deny it. Akhtar Ali Khan, on air, believes it bounced. I will wait for another replay to confirm his doubt.
down the leg side, wide called
yorker fetches him another wicket. It crashed into the front boot in front of leg and middle. The umpire Enamul reckons it would have clipped the leg. Hmm..
short of length, punched to extra cover for a risky single
in the corridor outside off stump and he is beaten again. Three in a row
beaten again. Rushing through the channel outside off and another leaden-footed drive
yorker on the middle stump line, edges a off drive to midwicket
the outside edge is taken and Bangladesh restricted for 178. Full in length, angling away and he tried to drive on the up and is gone.

inn2.comm: lands on a length, just outside off stump, shapes in a touch, defended on the front foot
length delivery around the off stump, pushed to covers
he plays an audacious sweep shot! He leaned forward and paddled it to fine leg.
leans forward and gets behind a line of a delivery around the off stump and guides to point
slanted across Gibbs who lets it go and Dhiman, standing up to the stumps, gathers
and again
starts off with a spinner. It turns in from outside off stump and is defended on the front foot
beaten outside off. Smith plays for the turn but there is none
fuller and Smith gets behind the line to play a solid defensive stroke
short and sharp turn to evade the poke and hits him on the pad
fuller, outside off, Smith shuffles across, goes for a sweep, misses and is struck on the pad but outside the line of off stump.
outside off stump, Smith pushes at it and gets a outside edge that takes the ball, along the ground, past the lone slip and to the boundary.
full and straight, hint of inward movement, defended on the front foot. Dhiman is standing up to the stumps
short in length, worked to mid-on
again short of length, outside off and that length allows Gibbs to wrist it behind square leg for a single
on the off stump, again back of length, pushed to covers
worked to left of mid-on for a well-placed single
slanted across Gibbs who lets Dhiman gather
leans across and pushes back to the bowler
spins down the leg side and Dhiman fails to gather cleanly
quicker, on the leg and middle, turned to midwicket
fuller, on the middle,  Gibbs jabs at it and it ran off the outside edge to third man boundary
quick again, short of length, pushed to point
104.3 kmph really quickish one, outside off, left alone
slower, spins outside off, left alone
in the zone outside off stump, steered to backward point where its misfield by Shakib
short of length, angling away, slower one, run down to third man
back of length, outside off stump, holds its line, Smith stabs and gets a inside edge to the on side
fuller, just outside off, runs off the inner edge to midwicket
leans forward to drive on the up to covers
in the zone outside off and guided to backward point
Gibbs shapes to sweep but realises its a short of length delivery outside off and cuts to point
spins away from Gibbs who shoulders arms
down the leg side and Dhiman can't take it cleanly
and again. That initial move to sweep and this time the bowler bowls if full outside off and he adjusts to steer it to point
Dhiman appeals for a catch behind but not given as the bat hit the pad and the ball spun past the edge
Gibbs goes over mid-on. SA are on 21 for 0. He went down on his knee and swung it over. He didn't connect properly but will get his boundary
goes for the quicker one again but slips well down leg side
full in length, just outside off, defended on the front foot
outside off and pushed to point
fullish, outside off, worked to midwicket
leans forward to drive to short cover
full pitched and drilled through extra cover
spins past Gibbs who shoulders arms
charges down the track and smashes it over the bowler's head.
driven hard off the back foot but can't beat the cover fielder
armer and defended on the front foot
outside off, full, tries to sweep and gets a bottom edge on to the pad
short of length, spins away, Gibbs tries to force off the back foot and gets a inner edge to the on side
fullish, hint of movement away, driven to mid-on
full in length, on the off stump line, defended to the covers
short in length, keeps low and pushed out to covers
shuffles across and drives back to the bowler
full pitched, outside off stump, edged to third man
loopy delivery, turned to left of mid-on for a single
landed on a length, around off and turned past the bat and Dhiman couldn't gather cleanly
turns outside off, short in length, Gibbs shapes to cut but the ball holds on him and he gets a bottom edge on to the ground
way outside off. Wide called
appeal for lbw but it struck him marginally outside off. Gibbs leaned across to defend a armer.
full pitched and Smith drives cleanly past the diving mid-off fielder
hit a wider length, Smith reaches out but cant beat cover
straighter one, middle and off, on-driven for an easy single
much, much wider and he reaches out and slaps it past point
that one sits up a touch but he guides it to third man
lands on middle and leg and he turns it to midwicket
flat outside off stump, he reaches and drives to cover
flatter still, worked off the pads but the 'keeper fields
full and flat, whipped it from off stump past a diving mid-on, hard shot
quicker one, off stump, he gets back and across to defend
slower through the air, loops down Smith's pads, he tries to turn but the ball balloons up and an enthusiastic Dhiman collects, diving forward
full on the pads and he flicks past square leg
sits up from a length, Smith is beaten and Dhiman takes very well
very wide, Smith chases but mistimes it to a diving point fielder
good line and length, no width, turned back to the bowler
sees the length and tries to paddle it, but it ends up going wider and he changes his mind at the last second, opening the face and playing to point, very odd shot
superb stroke, played on the up, with the width, past cover-point
better delivery, off stump, Gibbs defends off the front foot
spins towards leg, tucked past square for a single
comes in with the arm from round the stumps, keeps low, pretty slow and pushed to on side
leans forward to paddle a fuller delivery to fine leg
stays back, waits for a short of length delivery to spin in before punching it through wide mid-on.
on the pads, turned to deep midwicket
floated outside off, driven to covers
length delivery on the off stump, pushed back to bowler
full in length, around off stump, defended to covers
length delivery, on the off stump, guided to point
threatens to back away, shuffles back to off and turns to the leg side
length delivery, outside off, guided to third man
fullish, square driven to point
turns from outside off, nudged to right of backward square leg
leans across and guides to point
comes down the track and drives to long-off for a single
floating it outside off, defended to the off side
low full toss and put away to cover boundary with ease. No sweat.
on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
full and outside off, tries to paddle away but doesn't make proper contact and the ball rolls away to the leg side
slanted across, tries to tap it to third man but doesn't make contact
full in length, a tad quicker, square driven to backward point
on a length, outside off, pushed to covers
fullish, driven past covers
full and driven to mid-on
flighted outside off, pushed to the off side
skips down the track and drives inside-out to sweeper cover
tossed up well outside off and Smith fails to connect with his sweep and is struck on the pad. They appeal for a lbw but it hit him well outside off.
stays back to tuck a length delivery to square leg
another failed sweep, again struck on the pad but this time they don't appeal
turned to the on side
creamed through covers. Very full, very wide and four is the result.
full and outside off stump, steered to third man
on a length, around the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
fullish, just outside off, worked to midwicket for yet another single
welcomed with an imperious pull. Shahadat hurls it short, from round the stumps and Smith dismisses it from his presence.
outside off stump, short in length, hit straight to point
short of length again and Smith clips it to deep square leg region
short of length again, punched hard to covers
Gibbs too gets a boundary against Shahadat. He leaned forward and whipped a fullish delivery through wide mid-on
pretty short in length and pulled away to right of deep midwicket
leans forward to turn a full delivery past square leg
edged through the vacant slip region. ODI fifty no 36. It was tossed up full and well outside off, Smith reached out to drive and got an edge.
now unfurls the sweep shot and SA are on 96 without loss.
leans across to defend to covers
armer, struck on the pad but going down leg side
Gibbs goes down town. Charges down the track to drive straight down the ground.
full pitched, on the middle and leg, worked to long leg
drifts down leg side, wide called.
full pitched, on the middle and off, worked to deep midwicket
low full toss, driven hard to short cover. Shahadat thought it was a catch but it had clearly bumped as soon as it hit the bat
The boundaries keep coming. Overpitched, on the leg stump line and is whipped to wide long-on boundary.
leans forward to defend to the off side
around  off, tapped to backward point
around that off stump, opens the bat-face and guides to backward point again
on the middle and leg, misses a sweep and is struck on the pad
very short in length and pulled to deep square leg
short in length, Gibbs waits before punching it straight to long-off
yet another boundary. Smith pulls off a sweep shot. He has been trying that for some time now.
unfurls a paddle sweep this time.
goes back to a delivery that keeps low as it turns in and he manages to jab it away
full and outside off, Smith tries to pull off another sweep but is struck in the pad.
turned right of square leg for a quick single

The reverse sweep goes awry. Almost fatal. It got the top edge and ballooned towards short fine leg where Shahadat ran in to take a low 'catch'. Did it touch the ground? The umpires refer it upstairs .and the verdict is not out.
quickish turn and jabbed away with pad and bat to the on side.
outside off, tapped to the off side
full and driven back to the bowler
really full and driven to long-on for a single
comes in from outside off, a tad low and is pushed to point
shuffles across, waits for the turn before paddling to short fine-leg region
leans forward to defend a straight delivery to cover region

very nice shot. It was flighted full and he waited a touch before driving it inside-out through extra cover. He had initially, before the release, acted as if he was going to play a paddle sweep and as the bowler tried to adjust by bowling well outside off, he changed his position and went for the drive
straighter and he sends it towards long-on for a single
stays back to punch through the off side for a single
leans forward, opens the bat-face and guides to backward point
skips down the track and lofts inside-out to sweeper cover
outside off stump, goes on straight and he pushes inside the line and is beaten
turned to deep midwicket for a single
on the off stump line, coming in with the angle, tapped to backward point
fuller and square driven to deep point region
leans forward to dead-bat a full delivery

charges out and drives inside-out to extra cover boundary. ODI fifty no 34 for 
Gibbs.
on the middle, worked to point
sails over the straight boundary. He waltzed down the track and sent it soaring over the ropes.
outside off stump, tries to crash it through covers but misses
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine leg
slightly short of length, cut to point
turns in with bounce and as Dhiman was about to gather, Smith pulls off a late cut!
caught in front by an armer that kept low. Gibbs rocked back to pull but was undone by the lack of bounce.
turns his first delivery to short fine leg
spins in towards middle and off, worked to the on side
on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
short of length, outside off, cut to sweeper cover
spins towards off stump, punched to long-off
full and outside off, driven to long-off for yet another single
short and Smith pings the long-off again
leans across to defend
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
flighted full and driven past the diving cover fielder who gets a hand to it
goes back to punch a length delivery to long-on
stays back to fist a delivery around off stump to long-off
spins towards the pad and is tucked past square leg
short of length, from round the stumps, pulled to deep midwicket
length delivery coming in towards middle and off, worked to midwicket
beats the drive, rushes past the off stump and Dhiman clangs it as well
short of length, on the pads, tucked to square leg
murder! charges out to a length delivery and smokes it over mid-off. Fab shot.
slower one, on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
beaten. Full in length and that doesn't spin in as much as Smith expected
full and driven to long-on for a single
stays back to armer and pushes it to mid-on
fuller, quicker and defended to the on side
spins in from outside off, SMith goes back, waits before punching it for a single down to long on
Amla stays back to hit a slightly short of length delivery to sweeper cover
loud appeal for lbw but there is an inside edge. It was full and spun in sharply but hit the wood en route to the pad
There he goes. He just lunged forward and swung a tossed-up delivery over the long-on fielder
on the stumps, worked to midwicket
Amla gets four of 'em. He rocked back and cut to cover boundary. SA need 6 to win, Smith needs 4 of 'em to get to his ton but he is not on strike.
leans forward to push it to backward point
floated full, pushed to covers
leans forward to dead-bat
stays back and pushes a spinning delivery to point
he allows SMith to take the strike next over by offering the full face of the bat in defense. Smith needs 4 to get to his ton
spins from outside off, beats the intended sweep and goes down leg
stays back to pull a short of length delivery to right of deep midwicket
tossed up full outside off, Smith goes for a cut - perhaps, not the length for it - and misses
comes down the track, the bowler pushes it flat and its turned past square leg
full and straight, dead-batted away.
fires it quick, at the blockhole, dug out to the leg side
leans forward, on drives to left of short midwicket where Ashraful makes a neat diving stop
spins in from outside off and he is struck on the pad
shuffles to the off side and whips a delivery to square leg, but straight to the fielder
sweeps this time but sends it again to that man at square leg
Smith gets his hundred and SA seal the win. His 7th ODI ton. He came down the track, was beaten in the flight but lunged forward to chip it over the infield and it rolls over to the long-on boundary.
